pageContext.claim: “If you look at the stock market over the last few months, it's been great. And certainly since my election, it's up -- getting close to 50 percent -- the stock market.”
pageContext.analysis: The Dow Jones Industrial Average was up 27 percent from the time Trump took office to the day he made these remarks. The S&P 500 was up 19 percent and the Nasdaq composite index was up 31 percent. Measuring from the date of Trump's election in 2016, the stock market also was not "up close to 50 percent," as he claimed.
